author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
Shop this amazing statue here: https://tinyurl.com/2ys7bbzm

Today, we are taking an up-close look at an incredible new statue from @wetaworkshopnz - Radagast in Rhosgobel!  Radagast was one of the first book characters that made me realize how big (and sometimes mysterious) Tolkien's world is.  Wētā Workshop always makes incredible pieces and replicates characters and environments from the films with incredible detail and accuracy.  An amazing piece!

Product Description:
As it is told in the ancient lore, Radagast, a wizard of curious and rustic disposition, dwelt in a house most befitting his nature. In a secluded glen in the southern reaches of Mirkwood™, where the shadows of the great trees grew long, there lay Rhosgobel, the "brown dwelling." This abode was no ordinary cottage but rather a reflection of its master: untamed, overgrown, and imbued with a strange and whimsical charm.

Statue Details:
1:6 scale
Limited Edition of 800
Primarily made from polystone
Pots and pans made
title: Wētā Workshop's Radagast in Rhosgobel Statue Unboxing
